title: Apple (AAPL) Earnings Beat â€“ Technical Outlook & Trade Plan
text: Palantir (PLTR) â€“ Earnings Beat & Technical Setup Palantir (PLTR) delivered a huge earnings beat today â€” not just on revenue and EPS, but with forward guidance that far exceeded Wall Streetâ€™s expectations. Q4 2025 Numbers: - Revenue: $1.41B (vs. $1.33B expected) - Adj EPS: $0.25 (vs. $0.23 expected) - Q1 2026 Guide: $1.53Bâ€“$1.54B (vs. $1.34B expected) - FY 2026 Guide: $7.18Bâ€“$7.20B (vs. $6.27B expected) Thatâ€™s nearly $1 billion higher than Street consensus for the year ahead. Now the big question is whether thereâ€™s a technical setup for traders, or has the easy money already been made? In the video above, I break down: - The daily chart and how price responded to the earnings - Support zones that matter if PLTR pulls back - Bullish trade setup: where Iâ€™d look to get long, and where Iâ€™d place risk Palantir may be pricing in a lot of future growth already, but with this kind of guidance and a clean technical chart, it could still offer a solid breakout setup.
